name: Castle VR JR
description:
Castle VR ______________________

What is Castle VR?

Castle Vr is a VR game i made for my school finals. 

In Castle VR you can do what you want! You can go and draw on everything or go climbing on the many castles in the map go ziplining true the many castle or,  you can even go shooting in the shoothingrange. 

after all this fun maybe you can go and find all the torches that are spread around the map?  You decide what you want to do!

______________________
